name: Skele-Cat [Final]
description:
This game was made in its entirety by me for the SDGA Fall 2021 Jam aside from the music.

You are in-between a state of life and death, use this to your advantage by creating platforms out of your own bloody explosions. You will use your deaths to further progress in the game, but remember, there is a limit to how many times you can die before it becomes final. Also, you're an exploding cat.
